title: Oceanic University Rumble
body:
This is an open letter to all University Reps,

I'm Marco 'Leighton Meester' Chan I represent GULoL and I am launching Interstate Uni Rumble and I would like to know your interest, we already have 7 universities involved and I would like your university to also be represented in the Rumble
Why am I doing it? 
I feel Australian player base is weak in comparison to other regions in esports and League, so I want to increase the caliber and exposure of our players to make them better, faster and stronger. 

_**Key benefits:**_
1: To improve our players, to build stronger teams, to have a stronger esports community
2: Your teams gain more exposure and practice in preparation for the OUC (Oceanic Uni Championships) 
3: Meet other teams and people around Australia, that are involved or interested in League and Esports. 

_**Questions?**_
Ask me directly, and ask anything! Cant wait to get this rolling.
Side Note: I have OUW, UQ, QUT, UTS, FULC, JCU already interested, and myself from GULOL will be organising.

_Universities: _
Griffith University (QLD)
University of Queensland (QLD)
Queensland University of Technology (QLD)
University of Technology Sydney (NSW)
James Cook University (QLD)
University of Wollongong (NSW) 
Flinders University (SA)
- With many more still in process of accepting.

_**FAQ**_
More info about rumbles: _goo.gl/waWJgu_
How often: Once a week
Location: Online
Entrance: Free
Level Cap: Open
Format: Round Robin
Team limits: Unlimited, your teams will be placed in groups relevant to skill level.
Old Handle: The Paper Swan xD


_**How do you sign up?**_
1: Fill out this google forms expressing your interest: _https://goo.gl/forms/DVG16po8gxhj1HCm1_
2: Put in times and dates in this google sheets expressing your time of interest, e.g. Highlight time, then comment the name of your university so I know who you are: _https://goo.gl/rBUUot_

replies.body:
Hey Marco, 

Nice work on getting 7 unis onboard already! I'm excited to see how this goes. 

P.s. There's a couple of boards posts with others starting uni clubs [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/clubs/lelHnGZK-looking-to-start-a-james-cook-university-club-based-in-townsville) and [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/clubs/jlEOMOsm-western-sydney-university-students). So you might want to ping them too :)
